alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dawson County through 845 PM CDT... At 809 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eddyville, or 17 miles north of Lexington, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Dawson County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
